data.text:
Danish Greek Royals Continued! The Crown Princely Family of Greece

Pavlos, Crown Prince of Greece

DOB:20 May 1967

Parents: The deposed King & Queen of Greece

Godparents: The Prince of Wales

Claim to the throne: 1st for the Greek throne

Educated: England, US

He speaks English, Greek, German, French, Spanish and Italian

Marie-Chantal Claire, Crown Princess of Greece, Princess of Denmark

DOB:17 September 1968

Parents: María Clara "Chantal"née Pesantes Becerra & Robert Warren Miller

Educated: Hong Kong, Switzerland, France, US.

She is one of the infamous "Miller Sisters"

She chose to renounce her US citizenship in 2011.

Marie-Chantal designs her own range of luxury children's clothing and accessories for the self-titled company she founded in 2000. She has also written and illustrated "The Frog Prince", the first in a planned series of fairy-tales.

Princess Maria Olympia of Greece & Denmark

DOB: 5 July 1996

Parents:The Crown Princess and Crown Prince of Greece

Godparents: Prince Charles of Wales, Princess Alexia of Greece, Pia Getty, Prince Michael of Greece

Education: England, US

Claim to the throne: (Greek) 6th after her father and 4 brothers

She is the only daughter of the Crown Prince & Princess

Prince Constantine Alexios

DOB: 29 October 1998

Parents:The Crown Princess and Crown Prince of Greece

Godparents: Prince Nicolaos of Greece, Princess Alexandra of Fürstenberg (born as Miller), Crown Prince Felipe of Spain, Crown Prince Frederik of Denmark , Crown Princess Victoria of Sweden, Prince William of Wales, Prince Dimitri of Yugoslayia and Doris Robbs

Education: England, US

Claim to the throne: (Greek) 2nd after his father

He is named for his grandfather.

Prince Achileas-Andreas

DOB: 12 August 2000

Parents:The Crown Princess and Crown Prince of Greece

Godparents: Infanta Elena of Spain, Prince Guillaume of Luxembourg, Prince Kardem of Bulgaria, Princess Theodora of Greece, Princess Rosario of Bulgaria, Prince Alexandre von Furstenberg

Education: England, US

Claim to the throne: (Greek) 3rd after his father & brother

Like his older brother and sister, he was born in the USA.

Prince Odysseas-Kimon of Greece & Denmark

DOB: 17 September 2004

Parents: The Crown Princely Couple of Greece

Godparents: Prince Philippos, Nassos Thanopolous, Mr Arki Busson, Chris Thomsen, Crown Princess Mette-Marit of Norway, Princess Olga of Greece and Princess Alexandra Sayn-Wittgenstein

Educated: England, USA

Claim to the throne: (Greek) 4th after his father & 2 brothers

Unlike his older brother and sister, he was born in England.

Prince Aristidis-Stavros

DOB: 17 September 2004

Parents: The Crown Princely Couple of Greece

Godparents: Stavros Niarchos, Inftanta Cristina of Spain,

Educated: A little young for school yet!

Claim to the throne: (Greek) 5th after his father & 3 brothers

Like 3 of his elder siblings, he was born in the USA, only in California not New York.
